author: Albert Einstein
quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
author: Kevin Kruse

quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
author: Robert Frost
Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.
I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey
Mahatma Gandhi
quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.

author: Isaac Newton
quote: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.
You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Christopher Columbus
Moses
quote: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs
Albert Einstein
quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. ...
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky
Marie Curie
quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale
Prophet Muhammad
quote: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do...
author: Mark Twain

quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates
Mother Teresa
quote: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb
Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: True peace is not merely the absence of tension; it is the presence of justice.
Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
author: Charles Swindoll

quote: We must balance conspicuous consumption with conscious capitalism.
author: Kevin Kruse
Prophet Muhammad
quote: Seek knowledge from the cradle to the grave.
Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen
Jesus
quote: Do to others as you would have them do to you.
The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth
Jesus
quote: Love your neighbor as yourself.

author: Pablo Picasso
